Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to be followed by SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all variants where it appears after at least two reviewer agreements
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases that originated from a major revision cycle
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed (last occurrence in trace) to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and the subsequent EIC decision activity (e.g., SW-EIC Major Revision, SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time until SW-Awaiting EIC Decision is performed after the first SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time between SW-AE Assign Reviewers and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in traces containing SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in comparison with the duration of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation within the same trace
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average waiting time to the SW-Awaiting EIC Decision following the completion of all assigned reviewer responses (i.e., after the last SW-Reviewer Agreed or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs at least once
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to occur after Plagiarism Originality Report Completed in submissions that required reviewer input
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Cycle Time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision measured from the moment the first reviewer was invited (SW-AE Assign Reviewers) to its occurrence
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
